dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of adventure!

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: Thank you! I'm your guide throughout this journey.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I'm excited to begin. Where should I start?

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: You can start by selecting a character from the list.

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: Excellent choice. The warrior possesses great strength and combat skills.

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: Your first quest is to defeat the evil dragon and save the kingdom.
